# Programming Language Icons

Place your programming language icons here.

## Required Icons

Based on `data/cv.yaml`, you need:
- `python.png` - Python logo
- `java.png` - Java logo
- `cpp.png` - C/C++ logo
- `go.png` - Go/Golang logo

## Recommended Specifications

- **Format:** PNG (with transparency preferred)
- **Size:** 64x64 pixels or 128x128 pixels
- **File size:** < 50KB each
- **Background:** Transparent or white

## Where to Download Language Icons

### Official Sources
- **Python:** https://www.python.org/community/logos/
- **Java:** https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/
- **C++:** https://isocpp.org/
- **Go:** https://go.dev/blog/go-brand

### Icon Repositories
- **Simple Icons:** https://simpleicons.org/ (SVG, can convert to PNG)
- **DevIcons:** https://devicon.dev/
- **Iconify:** https://icon-sets.iconify.design/logos/

## Quick Download

For quick setup, you can use Simple Icons:
1. Visit https://simpleicons.org/
2. Search for the language name
3. Right-click and save as PNG, or download SVG and convert

## File Structure

```
static/pics/programming_langs/
├── python.png
├── java.png
├── cpp.png
└── go.png
```

## Note

Icons will appear in the Programming Languages section of your CV next to the language name.
